snippet: The iPhone 7, iPhone 7 Plus and the Watch all acquired new features, though none of them a game changer. Three of our writers delve into the advances.

headline.main: Daily Report: Tweaks on the Road to Wireless, but No Pyrotechnics From Apple

snippet: Apple is warning consumers about scam artists who pressure their victims into transferring money by purchasing iTunes gift cards after the fraudsters spin a bogus story about unpaid bills or a relative who needs bailing out of jail.

headline.main: Apple Warns Against Scams Involving iTunes Cards
headline.print_headline: Apple Warns Against Scams Involving iTunes Cards

snippet: Pennsylvania regulators are urging consumers who purchased certain batches of goat milk cheese from a central Pennsylvania dairy to throw it out because some samples tested positive for a certain bacteria.

headline.main: Officials Issue Warning About Bacteria in Farm's Goat Cheese
headline.print_headline: Officials Issue Warning About Bacteria in Farm's Goat Cheese

snippet: The overall tablet market is no longer a growth juggernaut, with weak sales from the likes of Apple and Samsung. But Amazonâ€™s sales are rising.
abstract: Amazon will soon introduce Fire HD 8, its latest tablet model offering larger touch screen, more RAM and longer battery life than its 7-inch $49 predecessor; priced at $90, retail giant is continuing successful strategy of undercutting tablet market competition.

headline.main: Amazon Has a Potent Weapon in the Tablet Wars: Low Prices
headline.print_headline: Low-Price Tablet Provides a Big Lift to Amazon

snippet: The warning came from Samsung and safety regulators. Dozens of the smartphones have caught fire or exploded in recent days, and a recall is underway.

headline.main: Galaxy Note 7 Owners Are Urged to Stop Using Their Phones
headline.print_headline: Regulators Urge Users to Turn Off Galaxy Note

snippet: European creditors urged the Greek government Friday to speed up the implementation of a series of economic reforms so it can get its hands on the next batch of bailout cash before the end of October.

headline.main: Greece Urged to Speed Up Reforms to Get More Bailout Cash
headline.print_headline: Greece Urged to Speed Up Reforms to Get More Bailout Cash

snippet: The European Commission will step up its campaign against corporate tax avoidance with proposals in the coming weeks on a common tax base for multinationals operating in the European Union, the commissioner for economic affairs said on Friday.

headline.main: EU to Step Up Tax Avoidance Fight With Plan for Common Tax Base-Moscovici
headline.print_headline: EU to Step Up Tax Avoidance Fight With Plan for Common Tax Base-Moscovici

snippet: The U.S. Consumer Product Safety Commission says owners of the Galaxy Note 7 smartphones should turn them off and stop using them because of the risk that their batteries can explode.

headline.main: US Agency: Samsung Galaxy Note 7 Too Dangerous to Use
headline.print_headline: US Agency: Samsung Galaxy Note 7 Too Dangerous to Use

snippet: The U.S. state of Washington has decided not to file criminal charges against the three police officers who fatally shot an undocumented Mexican farm worker in 2015 after he threw rocks at them and ran through a crowded intersection.

headline.main: Washington State Will Not Charge Police in Mexican Laborer's Slaying
headline.print_headline: Washington State Will Not Charge Police in Mexican Laborer's Slaying
